channel.title: 美联社

item.title: 各联盟与圣母大学达成 6 年协议，将大学橄榄球季后赛延续至 2031 年

item.title: 机场官员称，一架从旧金山飞往俄勒冈州梅德福的波音 737-800 飞机丢失了一块外部面板。飞机安全着陆，没有发生任何事故，在飞行后的检查中发现外部面板丢失。
item.description:
A Boeing 737-800 that flew from San Francisco to Medford, Oregon, lost an exterior panel, airport officials said. The plane landed safely without incident and the external panel was discovered missing during a post-flight inspection. https://t.co/4ENHfiO8Lx

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在 GLAAD 媒体奖颁奖典礼上，韦恩-布雷迪（Wayne Brady）谈到了他自去年公开自己的泛性身份后所感受到的自由。
item.description:
At the GLAAD Media Awards, Wayne Brady talks about the freedom he’s felt since coming out as pansexual last year. pic.twitter.com/Flf48Z8B8x

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的封口费刑事审判被推迟 30 天，因为他的律师说他们需要更多时间来筛选新证据。
item.description:
BREAKING: Donald Trump's hush-money criminal trial is delayed 30 days after his lawyers said they needed more time to sift through new evidence. https://t.co/YuJ1MTSPbt

item.title: 最新消息：以色列军方称，一艘船只于周五向加沙运送了人道主义物资、食品和水。这条从塞浦路斯出发的海上航线旨在帮助缓解以色列对加沙飞地发动的长达五个月的进攻所带来的人道主义危机。
item.description:
BREAKING: The Israeli military said a ship delivered humanitarian supplies, food and water to Gaza on Friday. The sea route from Cyprus is intended to help ease the humanitarian crisis brought by Israel’s 5-month-old offensive in the enclave. https://t.co/bX0vhZwl9q

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 负责监督该案的法官周五裁定，富尔顿县地方检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）必须退出佐治亚州起诉唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）干预选举的案件，或撤换与她有恋爱关系的特别检察官，案件才能继续进行。
item.description:
Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis must step aside from the Georgia election interference case against Donald Trump or remove the special prosecutor with whom she had a romantic relationship before the case can proceed, the judge overseeing it ruled Friday. pic.twitter.com/h3JC8B3Iac

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 15, 2024

item.title: 凯亚-格伯（Kaia Gerber）说，她的图书俱乐部 "图书馆科学 "已经成为一个由读者和作者组成的 "不可思议的社区"。她出演了新的喜剧系列片 "Palm Royale"。

item.title: 保罗-路德（Paul Rudd）谈到了他在新片《捉鬼敢死队》中与原版捉鬼敢死队成员比尔-莫瑞（Bill Murray）、厄尼-哈德森（Ernie Hudson）和丹-艾克洛德（Dan Aykroyd）合作的 "超现实 "经历：冰封帝国
item.description:
Paul Rudd talks about his "surreal" experience working with original Ghostbusters Bill Murray, Ernie Hudson, and Dan Aykroyd for the new film "Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire." pic.twitter.com/dqQzX31CQW

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 15, 2024
